title: Ticket #596: Serve CondorView data via SOAP (or other HTTP) interface
description:
The CondorView part of the condor_collector should be able to serve its information via SOAP or similar HTTP interface. The interface should be generic enough to field queries for fields and ads not currently supported, in support of work on #594. The planned immediate user is #597.

This interface should also be able to report a "recommended graph type" for a given field. Perhaps "Type: line|bar|area" and "stacked|not-stacked" as an option. This information would be simply hard coded, and exists solely to simplify #597.
